headline: Trifork Group: Completion of 51.0% divestment of Trifork Security
summary: Schindellegi, Switzerland – 30 October 2025 Trifork Group AGPress release Completion of 51.0% divestment of Trifork Security On 19 August 2025, Trifork Group and key employees signed an agreement for a divestment of 51.0% of Trifork Security A/S to Wingmen Solutions ApS (Company Announcement 40/2025). headline: 2 Mega-Cap Stocks to Target This Week and 1 We Question
summary: Megacap stocks dominate their sectors and their actions influence economies worldwide. The flip side though is that their sheer size means they have less room for explosive growth as scale works against them.
